name: Deeper and Deeper - LD48
description:
You are an un-named individual exploring a ever descending tower for un-explained reasons.

Everything created by me (Dave: Minibobbo) in 48 hours.

Featuring

- 2D Dynamically Lit Pixel Art

- Fiendish Traps

- Other Random Things I crammed in, like waterfalls that put out your fire

- Over 7 levels included! (there are 8)
